name: Tomer Koren
content: Tomer Koren · Homepage Tomer Koren Associate Professor @ TAU Senior Researcher @ Google Tel Aviv, Israel tkoren at tauex dot tau dot ac dot il © 2025 About I’m an Associate Professor in The Blavatnik School of Computer Science and AI at Tel Aviv University and a Senior Research Scientist at Google Research, Tel Aviv. I received my PhD from the Technion—Israel Institute of Technology. My research interests are in machine learning, optimization, and reinforcement learning.
